author: travelandtourworld.com
title: PAITC 2015 Conference Delegates to 'Get Cultured'
text:
PAITC 2015 Conference Delegates to ‘Get Cultured’ Published on : Saturday, August 1, 2015
The Aboriginal Tourism Association of BC has ensured that all conference delegates get the opportunity to experience local, authentic Aboriginal experiences, while in Vancouver for the Pacific Asia Indigenous Tourism & Trade Conference (PAITC) 2015.
Local, half-day, authentic Aboriginal experiences have been included on Day 1, 12 September, as part of delegates’ conference registration. Three amazing cultural experiences will be featured.
Stanley Park Talking Trees Tour with Talaysay Tours
Stanley Park is a cultural mecca and ecological wonder right in the heart of Vancouver and the perfect place to enjoy a First Nations interpretive tour with Talasay Tours.
Canoe Adventure with Takaya Tours in Indian Arm
A fascinating cultural guided canoe tour will be provided by Takaya Tours in replica ocean-going canoes of Indian Arm in the traditional territory of the Tsleil-Waututh Nation.
Source:-PAITC
